main event: On 17 September 1952, two formations of three flat, bright white objects were observed flying slowly in a delta formation over Tucson, Arizona.
interesting points: The objects were seen below the skyline of the Tucson Mountains., The sighting lasted for 2 to 3 seconds., No loss of aircraft traffic was reported in the area., The objects exhibited a slow rate of speed and a straight course., The formation of the objects was noted as delta.
sighted object: Two formations of three flat, bright white objects
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. J. M. Jordan observed several glowing, circular objects flying in formation.
